onset.Description: Time the event occurred, relative to the time the recording began.

duration.Description: Duration of the marked event (-1 indicates no duration, which is default for all events).

time_abs.Description: Absolute time for the event (real world time).

time_rel.Description: Relative time for the event (time elapsed since the beginning of the recording).

event.Description: Event marker text (extracted from the annotations field in the Natus software).
